metadata.name: Mirage
metadata.description:
The silent glow of dusk reflects off the vastness of the flooded desert. Each step ripples into the horizon as the stillness paints the mirage around me. The ground glistens with the light of the sky and the stars from below my feet. I walk through the warm desert air like a fish in a current. The deep blue of twilight stretches its arms as the sun whispers ‘good night’. I am stuck here, wandering in a state of bliss.


A collaboration between @cinnadine + @jakob_lr
